info.name: Loot the Louvre
info.attribution:
Game layout, library image, and scripting by Robin Harn, released to the Public Domain under CC0.

All card icons are from https://game-icons.net and are used under CC BY 3.0.

The following graphics are from http://www.freepik.com and are used under the Freepik license:
* City Silhouettes https://www.freepik.com/free-vector/city-silhouettes_796294.htm
info.description: Plan a daring heist with cards in your hand. Win tricks to cover the evidence.

label-guidetext-2.text:
Normal Scoring:
+2 pts per covered evidence
-1 pts per loose evidence
+5 pts if perfect (no loose evidence)

label-guidetext-3.text:
Successful Snitch Scoring:
+1 pts per covered evidence
-2 pts per loose evidence
Nobody scores perfect bonus
Snitch gets +10 pts snitch bonus

label-guidetext-1.text:
Players:		Deck:		Hand:		Max Bid:
2p			1-12		15 cards	6 evidence
3p			1-12		16 cards	5 evidence
4p			1-15		15 cards	4 evidence
5p			1-15		12 cards	3 evidence

fields.text: You're about to snitch, and return all evidence that you've bid this round back into your hand. Are you sure?
